sn54.11:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava icchanangale viharati icchanangalavanasande.
sn54.11:1.4: Namhi kenaci upasankamitabbo, annatra ekena pindapataniharakena”ti.
sn54.11:1.5: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato patissutva nassudha koci bhagavantam upasankamati, annatra ekena pindapataniharakena.
sn54.11:2.1: Atha kho bhagava tassa temasassa accayena patisallana vutthito bhikkhu amantesi:
sn54.11:2.2: “sace kho, bhikkhave, annatitthiya paribbajaka evam puccheyyum:
sn54.11:2.3: ‘katamenavuso, viharena samano gotamo vassavasam bahulam vihasi’ti, evam puttha tumhe, bhikkhave, tesam annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam evam byakareyyatha:
sn54.11:2.4: ‘anapanassatisamadhina kho, avuso, bhagava vassavasam bahulam vihasi’ti.
sn54.11:2.5: Idhaham, bhikkhave, sato assasami, sato passasami.
sn54.11:2.6: Digham assasanto ‘digham assasami’ti pajanami, digham passasanto ‘digham passasami’ti pajanami;
sn54.11:2.7: rassam assasanto ‘rassam assasami’ti pajanami, rassam passasanto ‘rassam passasami’ti pajanami;
sn54.11:3.1: Yanhi tam, bhikkhave, samma vadamano vadeyya:
sn54.11:3.5: Ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sekha appattamanasa anuttaram yogakkhemam patthayamana viharanti tesam anapanassatisamadhi bhavito bahulikato asavanam khayaya samvattati.
sn54.11:3.6: Ye ca kho te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arahanto khinasava vusitavanto katakaraniya ohitabhara anuppattasadattha parikkhinabhavasamyojana sammadannavimutta, tesam anapanassatisamadhi bhavito bahulikato ditthadhammasukhaviharaya ceva samvattati satisampajannaya ca.
sn54.11:4.1: Yanhi tam, bhikkhave, samma vadamano vadeyya:
